column4: i don't pay more for blu ray, like almost everyone i'm content with dvd lol blu ray's only successful marked is gaming so far
can i install Ubuntu on my samsung delve? and if i do will the phone functions still work?
so linux on phones is just for hobbyists that have no intention of making calls or sending texts? lol

installing linux on a phone is like installing linux on your microwave. sure, it gets you geek cred, but it probably ruins the device's intended functionality. if you want linux on a phone, i think nokia's n900 uses it..and it's preinstalled, obviously
